de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking

Class UdpConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking.UdpConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSink

    public class UdpConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSink
    The UdpConnection class is an UDP implementation of the DataSink interface; it sends all input data to the host and port given in the constructor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  UdpConnection.SensorOut
      Class to encapsulate sending SensorData objects asynchronously
